description: Enhanced PostgreSQL statement analysis dashboard with comprehensive table view and visual analytics

panels.description:
Comprehensive query performance analysis from pg_stat_statements.

**Column Guide:**
- **Query ID** - Internal PostgreSQL query identifier (click to drill down)
- **Total Runtime** - Total cumulative execution time
- **Avg Runtime** - Average execution time per call
- **Plan Time** - Total time spent planning queries
- **Avg Plan Time** - Average planning time per call
- **Calls** - Number of times executed
- **Rows** - Total rows retrieved/affected
- **Avg Rows** - Average rows per execution
- **Shared Hit (MB)** - Buffer cache hits - data found in memory (higher is better)
- **Shared Read (MB)** - Data read from disk into shared buffers (cache misses)
- **Shared Written (MB)** - Data written from shared buffers to disk
- **Temp Read (MB)** - Data read from temporary files (indicates memory pressure)
- **Temp Written (MB)** - Data written to temporary files during large operations
- **IO Time** - Time spent on disk I/O operations (requires track_io_timing)
- **% DB Total** - Percentage of total database execution time
- **Users** - Database roles that executed this query
- **Query** - Normalized SQL text with constants replaced by placeholders

value.title: Opens 'Single query details' dashboard for that queryid

targets.rawSql:
-- Enhanced comprehensive query analysis (Fast mode)
WITH query_stats AS (
  select
    tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
    max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric) as total_runtime,
    (max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric)) / nullif(max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8), 0) as avg_runtime,
    max((data->>'total_plan_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_plan_time')::numeric) as plan_time,
    (max((data->>'total_plan_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_plan_time')::numeric)) / nullif(max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8), 0) as avg_plan_time,
    max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls,
    max((data->>'rows')::int8) - min((data->>'rows')::int8) as rows,
    (max((data->>'rows')::int8) - min((data->>'rows')::int8))::numeric / nullif(max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8), 0) as avg_rows,
    (max((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as shared_hit_mb,
    (max((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as shared_read_mb,
    (max((data->>'shared_blks_written')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_written')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as shared_written_mb,
    (max((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as temp_read_mb,
    (max((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as temp_written_mb,
    (max((data->>'blk_read_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'blk_read_time')::numeric)) + 
    (max((data->>'blk_write_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'blk_write_time')::numeric)) as io_time,
    case when length(tag_data->>'query') > 150 then (tag_data->>'query')::varchar(150) || '...' else tag_data->>'query' end as query
  from stat_statements
  where dbname = '$dbname'
    and $__timeFilter(time)
    and case 
        when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
        else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
    end
  group by tag_data->>'queryid', tag_data->>'query'
  having max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) > 0
),
with_percentages AS (
  select 
    *,
    100 * total_runtime / nullif((select sum(total_runtime) from query_stats), 0) as pct_db_total
  from query_stats
)
select
  queryid,
  total_runtime::int8 as "Total Runtime (ms)",
  avg_runtime::numeric(10,2) as "Avg Runtime (ms)",
  plan_time::int8 as "Plan Time (ms)",
  avg_plan_time::numeric(10,2) as "Avg Plan Time (ms)",
  calls as "Calls",
  rows as "Rows",
  avg_rows::numeric(10,1) as "Avg Rows",
  shared_hit_mb::numeric(10,1) as "Shared Hit (MB)",
  shared_read_mb::numeric(10,1) as "Shared Read (MB)",
  shared_written_mb::numeric(10,1) as "Shared Written (MB)",
  temp_read_mb::numeric(10,1) as "Temp Read (MB)",
  temp_written_mb::numeric(10,1) as "Temp Written (MB)",
  io_time::numeric(10,1) as "IO Time (ms)",
  pct_db_total::numeric(5,1) as "% DB Total",
  (select data->>'users' from stat_statements where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' and tag_data->>'queryid' = with_percentages.queryid order by time desc limit 1) as "Users",
  query as "Query"
from with_percentages
order by total_runtime desc nulls last
limit $top

panels.title: Enhanced Query Performance Analysis Table

targets.rawSql:
-- Top queries by calls over time
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) as calls,
  tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid
FROM
  stat_statements
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND case 
      when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
      else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
  end
  AND tag_data->>'queryid' IN (
    select tag_data->>'queryid'
    from stat_statements
    where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname'
      and case 
          when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
          else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
      end
    group by tag_data->>'queryid'
    having max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) > 0
    order by max((data->>'calls')::int8) - min((data->>'calls')::int8) desc
    limit $top
  )
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Top $top statements by calls over time

targets.rawSql:
-- Top queries by total execution time over time
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric) as total_time,
  tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid
FROM
  stat_statements
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND case 
      when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
      else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
  end
  AND tag_data->>'queryid' IN (
    select tag_data->>'queryid'
    from stat_statements
    where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname'
      and case 
          when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
          else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
      end
    group by tag_data->>'queryid'
    having max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric) > 0
    order by max((data->>'total_time')::numeric) - min((data->>'total_time')::numeric) desc
    limit $top
  )
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

-- Top queries by rows over time
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  max((data->>'rows')::int8) - min((data->>'rows')::int8) as rows,
  tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid
FROM
  stat_statements
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND case 
      when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
      else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
  end
  AND tag_data->>'queryid' IN (
    select tag_data->>'queryid'
    from stat_statements
    where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname'
      and case 
          when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
          else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
      end
    group by tag_data->>'queryid'
    having max((data->>'rows')::int8) - min((data->>'rows')::int8) > 0
    order by max((data->>'rows')::int8) - min((data->>'rows')::int8) desc
    limit $top
  )
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

-- Top queries by shared blocks hit over time
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  (max((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as shared_hit_mb,
  tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid
FROM
  stat_statements
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND case 
      when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
      else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
  end
  AND tag_data->>'queryid' IN (
    select tag_data->>'queryid'
    from stat_statements
    where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname'
      and case 
          when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
          else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
      end
    group by tag_data->>'queryid'
    having max((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8) > 0
    order by (max((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_hit')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 desc
    limit $top
  )
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

-- Top queries by shared blocks read over time
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  (max((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as shared_read_mb,
  tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid
FROM
  stat_statements
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND case 
      when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
      else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
  end
  AND tag_data->>'queryid' IN (
    select tag_data->>'queryid'
    from stat_statements
    where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname'
      and case 
          when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
          else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
      end
    group by tag_data->>'queryid'
    having max((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8) > 0
    order by (max((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'shared_blks_read')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 desc
    limit $top
  )
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

-- Top queries by temp blocks read over time
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  (max((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as temp_read_mb,
  tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid
FROM
  stat_statements
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND case 
      when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
      else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
  end
  AND tag_data->>'queryid' IN (
    select tag_data->>'queryid'
    from stat_statements
    where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname'
      and case 
          when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
          else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
      end
    group by tag_data->>'queryid'
    having max((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8) > 0
    order by (max((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_read')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 desc
    limit $top
  )
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Top $top statements by temp bytes read (in MB)

targets.rawSql:
-- Top queries by temp blocks written over time
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  (max((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 as temp_written_mb,
  tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid
FROM
  stat_statements
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND case 
      when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
      else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
  end
  AND tag_data->>'queryid' IN (
    select tag_data->>'queryid'
    from stat_statements
    where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname'
      and case 
          when '$query_filter_regex' like '!%' then not tag_data->>'query' ~* substring('$query_filter_regex' from 2)
          else tag_data->>'query' ~* '$query_filter_regex' 
      end
    group by tag_data->>'queryid'
    having max((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8) > 0
    order by (max((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8) - min((data->>'temp_blks_written')::int8)) * 8192 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 desc
    limit $top
  )
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

options.content: ## Brought to you by

list.label: Monitored Source
list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics WHERE metric = 'stat_statements' ORDER BY 1;

list.description: Limit output to top N entries
list.label: Top N
list.name: top

list.description: Custom regex filter for queries. Use '!' prefix to exclude, e.g., '!pgwatch_generated' excludes queries containing 'pgwatch_generated'. Use regular expressions like 'SELECT|INSERT' to include only specific patterns.
list.label: Filter RegEx
list.name: query_filter_regex

title: 4. Query Performance Analysis
